descriptionHtml:
A story about her will be added soon.

A request from a friend who also helped with this mod. She is compatible with UNPB and CBBE. You can find Ahri in High Hrothgar. Will be taken down if the creator of any mod I use change their mind or did not get permission from.

Requests: I do take requests, but as for right now I can only do follower mods.

Known Issues:
None so far.

Requirements:
The Kitsune Race - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30330/?
Ahri Armor - http://www.4shared.com/archive/REkAjRMRba/Ahri_v12.html
LoL Armor - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37385/?
Project Sekirei Sexy japanese clothes - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13963/?
Kaw's Claws - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5910/?
ApachiSkyHair Female 1.4 - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?

Recommended:
Anyone can sing - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52989/?
League of Legends Ahri Voice Pack Korean Version - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48915/?

Credit:

Ahri Armor by unknown
